Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Also hit this with CR build for https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/29176/2

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Roger. Let's keep it up for a few more days until after FAB-13920 is merged. If we get no more failures, we should be good to close. Linking it to FAB-13920 so that we don't forget.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: We've bumped the Raft library a few days ago and the chances of bumping into such issues should now be much much smaller (see update in FAB-13920). Closing this but feel free to re-open or post a new flake if you notice anything odd.
